dashboard.label: Ratings Trending by Company
dashboard.description: Company Rating Trends with WoW, MoM, QoQ, YoY Analysis and Company Logos

search.query: index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:portfolio" OR sourcetype="bitsight:companies" | dedup company_name | table company_name
index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:portfolio" | dedup tier | table tier

index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:portfolio" OR sourcetype="bitsight:companies" | where company_name LIKE "%$company_filter$%" AND (tier LIKE "%$tier_filter$%" OR isnull(tier)) | dedup company_name | eval logo_html=if(isnotnull(logo_url) AND logo_url!="", "", "") | eval rating_category=case( rating>=740, "Advanced", rating>=700, "Good", rating>=640, "Fair", rating>=600, "Poor", 1=1, "Critical" ) | table logo_url, company_name, rating, rating_category, industry, tier, guid | rename logo_url as "Logo", company_name as "Company", rating as "Current Rating", rating_category as "Category", industry as "Industry", tier as "Tier", guid as "GUID" | sort -"Current Rating"

index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:ratings_history" OR sourcetype="bitsight:company_ratings_history" | where company_name LIKE "%$company_filter$%" | eval month=strftime(_time, "%Y-%m") | stats latest(rating) as current_rating, earliest(rating) as prev_rating by company_name | eval change=current_rating-prev_rating | where change > 0 | stats count

index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:ratings_history" OR sourcetype="bitsight:company_ratings_history" | where company_name LIKE "%$company_filter$%" | eval month=strftime(_time, "%Y-%m") | stats latest(rating) as current_rating, earliest(rating) as prev_rating by company_name | eval change=current_rating-prev_rating | where change < 0 | stats count

index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:ratings_history" OR sourcetype="bitsight:company_ratings_history" | where company_name LIKE "%$company_filter$%" | eval month=strftime(_time, "%Y-%m") | stats latest(rating) as current_rating, earliest(rating) as prev_rating by company_name | eval change=current_rating-prev_rating | where change=0 | stats count

index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:ratings_history" OR sourcetype="bitsight:company_ratings_history" | where company_name LIKE "%$company_filter$%" | stats latest(rating) as current_rating, earliest(rating) as prev_rating by company_name | eval change=current_rating-prev_rating | stats avg(change) as avg_change | eval avg_change=round(avg_change, 1)

panel.title: Company Rating Trends (WoW, MoM, QoQ, YoY)

search.query: index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:portfolio" OR sourcetype="bitsight:companies" | where company_name LIKE "%$company_filter$%" AND (tier LIKE "%$tier_filter$%" OR isnull(tier)) | dedup company_name | rename rating as current_rating | join type=left company_name [ search index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:ratings_history" OR sourcetype="bitsight:company_ratings_history" earliest=-14d latest=-7d | stats latest(rating) as week_ago_rating by company_name ] | join type=left company_name [ search index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:ratings_history" OR sourcetype="bitsight:company_ratings_history" earliest=-60d latest=-30d | stats latest(rating) as month_ago_rating by company_name ] | join type=left company_name [ search index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:ratings_history" OR sourcetype="bitsight:company_ratings_history" earliest=-120d latest=-90d | stats latest(rating) as quarter_ago_rating by company_name ] | join type=left company_name [ search index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:ratings_history" OR sourcetype="bitsight:company_ratings_history" earliest=-400d latest=-365d | stats latest(rating) as year_ago_rating by company_name ] | eval wow_change=if(isnotnull(week_ago_rating), current_rating-week_ago_rating, null()) | eval mom_change=if(isnotnull(month_ago_rating), current_rating-month_ago_rating, null()) | eval qoq_change=if(isnotnull(quarter_ago_rating), current_rating-quarter_ago_rating, null()) | eval yoy_change=if(isnotnull(year_ago_rating), current_rating-year_ago_rating, null()) | eval wow_trend=case(wow_change>0, "↑", wow_change<0, "↓", wow_change=0, "→", 1=1, "-") | eval mom_trend=case(mom_change>0, "↑", mom_change<0, "↓", mom_change=0, "→", 1=1, "-") | eval qoq_trend=case(qoq_change>0, "↑", qoq_change<0, "↓", qoq_change=0, "→", 1=1, "-") | eval yoy_trend=case(yoy_change>0, "↑", yoy_change<0, "↓", yoy_change=0, "→", 1=1, "-") | table logo_url, company_name, current_rating, wow_change, wow_trend, mom_change, mom_trend, qoq_change, qoq_trend, yoy_change, yoy_trend, tier, industry | rename logo_url as "Logo", company_name as "Company", current_rating as "Rating", wow_change as "WoW Δ", wow_trend as "WoW", mom_change as "MoM Δ", mom_trend as "MoM", qoq_change as "QoQ Δ", qoq_trend as "QoQ", yoy_change as "YoY Δ", yoy_trend as "YoY", tier as "Tier", industry as "Industry" | sort -Rating

index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:ratings_history" OR sourcetype="bitsight:company_ratings_history" | where company_name LIKE "%$company_filter$%" | timechart span=1w latest(rating) by company_name limit=15

index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:portfolio" OR sourcetype="bitsight:companies" | where company_name LIKE "%$company_filter$%" | dedup company_name | rename rating as current_rating | join type=left company_name [ search index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:ratings_history" OR sourcetype="bitsight:company_ratings_history" earliest=-30d@d latest=-29d@d | stats earliest(rating) as month_ago_rating by company_name ] | eval change=current_rating-month_ago_rating | where change > 0 | table logo_url, company_name, month_ago_rating, current_rating, change | rename logo_url as "Logo", company_name as "Company", month_ago_rating as "30 Days Ago", current_rating as "Current", change as "Improvement" | sort -Improvement | head 10

index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:portfolio" OR sourcetype="bitsight:companies" | where company_name LIKE "%$company_filter$%" | dedup company_name | rename rating as current_rating | join type=left company_name [ search index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:ratings_history" OR sourcetype="bitsight:company_ratings_history" earliest=-30d@d latest=-29d@d | stats earliest(rating) as month_ago_rating by company_name ] | eval change=current_rating-month_ago_rating | where change < 0 | table logo_url, company_name, month_ago_rating, current_rating, change | rename logo_url as "Logo", company_name as "Company", month_ago_rating as "30 Days Ago", current_rating as "Current", change as "Decline" | sort Decline | head 10

index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:ratings_history" OR sourcetype="bitsight:company_ratings_history" | where company_name LIKE "%$company_filter$%" | eval week=strftime(_time, "%Y-W%W") | stats latest(rating) as rating by company_name, week | sort company_name, week | streamstats current=f last(rating) as prev_rating by company_name | eval wow_change=rating-prev_rating | where isnotnull(prev_rating) | chart avg(wow_change) as "Avg WoW Change" by week

index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:ratings_history" OR sourcetype="bitsight:company_ratings_history" | where company_name LIKE "%$company_filter$%" | eval week=strftime(_time, "%Y-W%W") | stats latest(rating) as rating by company_name, week | sort company_name, week | streamstats current=f last(rating) as prev_rating by company_name | eval wow_change=rating-prev_rating | where isnotnull(prev_rating) | eval change_bucket=case( wow_change <= -20, "Significant Drop (-20+)", wow_change < -5, "Moderate Drop (-5 to -20)", wow_change < 0, "Minor Drop (0 to -5)", wow_change = 0, "No Change", wow_change <= 5, "Minor Gain (0 to 5)", wow_change <= 20, "Moderate Gain (5 to 20)", 1=1, "Significant Gain (20+)" ) | stats count by change_bucket

index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:ratings_history" OR sourcetype="bitsight:company_ratings_history" | where company_name LIKE "%$company_filter$%" | eval month=strftime(_time, "%Y-%m") | stats latest(rating) as rating by company_name, month | sort company_name, month | streamstats current=f last(rating) as prev_rating by company_name | eval mom_change=rating-prev_rating | where isnotnull(prev_rating) | xyseries month, company_name, mom_change

index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:ratings_history" OR sourcetype="bitsight:company_ratings_history" | where company_name LIKE "%$company_filter$%" | eval quarter=strftime(_time, "%Y-Q") + tostring(ceil(tonumber(strftime(_time, "%m"))/3)) | stats latest(rating) as rating, avg(rating) as avg_rating by company_name, quarter | sort company_name, quarter | xyseries quarter, company_name, rating

index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:ratings_history" OR sourcetype="bitsight:company_ratings_history" | where company_name LIKE "%$company_filter$%" | eval quarter=strftime(_time, "%Y-Q") + tostring(ceil(tonumber(strftime(_time, "%m"))/3)) | stats latest(rating) as rating by company_name, quarter | sort company_name, quarter | streamstats current=f last(rating) as prev_rating by company_name | eval qoq_change=rating-prev_rating | where isnotnull(prev_rating) | stats latest(rating) as current_rating, latest(qoq_change) as latest_qoq, avg(qoq_change) as avg_qoq, sum(qoq_change) as total_change by company_name | eval avg_qoq=round(avg_qoq, 1) | table company_name, current_rating, latest_qoq, avg_qoq, total_change | rename company_name as "Company", current_rating as "Current Rating", latest_qoq as "Latest QoQ", avg_qoq as "Avg QoQ", total_change as "Total Change" | sort -current_rating

index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:ratings_history" OR sourcetype="bitsight:company_ratings_history" | where company_name LIKE "%$company_filter$%" | eval year=strftime(_time, "%Y") | stats avg(rating) as avg_rating, latest(rating) as end_rating, earliest(rating) as start_rating by company_name, year | eval yearly_change=end_rating-start_rating | xyseries year, company_name, avg_rating

index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:ratings_history" OR sourcetype="bitsight:company_ratings_history" | where company_name LIKE "%$company_filter$%" | eval year=strftime(_time, "%Y") | stats latest(rating) as end_rating, earliest(rating) as start_rating, min(rating) as min_rating, max(rating) as max_rating, avg(rating) as avg_rating by company_name, year | eval yoy_change=end_rating-start_rating, volatility=max_rating-min_rating | stats latest(end_rating) as current_rating, latest(yoy_change) as latest_yoy, avg(avg_rating) as overall_avg, sum(yoy_change) as cumulative_change, avg(volatility) as avg_volatility by company_name | eval overall_avg=round(overall_avg, 0), avg_volatility=round(avg_volatility, 0) | table company_name, current_rating, latest_yoy, overall_avg, cumulative_change, avg_volatility | rename company_name as "Company", current_rating as "Current Rating", latest_yoy as "Latest YoY Δ", overall_avg as "Historical Avg", cumulative_change as "Cumulative Δ", avg_volatility as "Avg Volatility" | sort -current_rating

panel.title: Companies by Rating Category Over Time

search.query: index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:ratings_history" OR sourcetype="bitsight:company_ratings_history" | where company_name LIKE "%$company_filter$%" | eval month=strftime(_time, "%Y-%m") | eval rating_category=case( rating>=740, "Advanced", rating>=700, "Good", rating>=640, "Fair", rating>=600, "Poor", 1=1, "Critical" ) | stats dc(company_name) as companies by month, rating_category | xyseries month, rating_category, companies

index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:ratings_history" OR sourcetype="bitsight:company_ratings_history" | where company_name LIKE "%$company_filter$%" | eval month=strftime(_time, "%Y-%m") | stats latest(rating) as current_rating, earliest(rating) as first_rating by company_name | eval current_category=case( current_rating>=740, "Advanced", current_rating>=700, "Good", current_rating>=640, "Fair", current_rating>=600, "Poor", 1=1, "Critical" ) | eval first_category=case( first_rating>=740, "Advanced", first_rating>=700, "Good", first_rating>=640, "Fair", first_rating>=600, "Poor", 1=1, "Critical" ) | eval transition=first_category." → ".current_category | eval improved=if(current_rating>first_rating, "Yes", if(current_rating<first_rating, "No", "Same")) | table company_name, first_rating, first_category, current_rating, current_category, transition, improved | rename company_name as "Company", first_rating as "Starting Rating", first_category as "Starting Category", current_rating as "Current Rating", current_category as "Current Category", transition as "Category Transition", improved as "Improved?" | sort -"Current Rating"
